<!--Starting Blurb-->
I've been making nouns and sharing them on [Noun Project](/nouns) for about two years now. I was interested in seeing which nouns were the most popular, so I collected data on which nouns people downloaded. Here are the results.

## Top 100, 2018-2020
These are the hundred most-downloaded icons I have made (Aug 2018-Aug 2020). 

![](hundred01.png)

Notes:

- The most popular icon is also one of the simplest: [paint stroke](https://thenounproject.com/browse/?i=2352019). With over 10K downloads, it is by far my most downloaded icon.
- Most of the popular icons have very simple names (heart, gas, cat, search)
- A few popular ones I'm particularly proud of:
  - #28 [Package](https://thenounproject.com/browse/?i=2082419)
  - #35 [Lotus Pose](https://thenounproject.com/browse/?i=3098225)
  - #49 [Coffee Drinker](https://thenounproject.com/browse/?i=2937161)
  - #53 [Gas Mask](https://thenounproject.com/browse/?i=2664507)
  - #89 [Gas](https://thenounproject.com/browse/?i=1988082)
  
Thanks for two great years of icons. More to come...

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/IoMkSXKHQIDVm/giphy.gif)
